would be ideal.
Also let us know what you have done to get it.

Are you using 3.1M4?
This could be a duplicate of bug 77968.

Can you reproduce using 3.1M4?
If not, I would close as a duplicate.
Please reopen if you can reproduce the problem with 3.1M6 or more recent build
